existing_features.title: Create a chat interface component with message history display, user input field, and send button that supports conversational interactions
Connect frontend chat interface to backend query system so user questions are processed and appropriate college information responses are displayed in the conversation

Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, academic styling using earth tones (greens, browns, creams) combined with modern typography and clean layouts that convey trust and professionalism suitable for an educational institution

new_feature_requests.summary: Add comprehensive college information database (admissions, courses, campus life, etc.)

Implement backend data structure storing comprehensive college information including admissions requirements, available courses and programs, campus facilities and life, application deadlines, tuition fees, scholarship opportunities, contact information, and frequently asked questions
Build intelligent question-answer matching system that analyzes user questions, identifies relevant topics and keywords, and returns appropriate answers from the college information database
